capstone.ui

Class LevelWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
      • capstone.ui.Widget
        • capstone.ui.LevelWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    public class LevelWindow
extends Widget
    Window to select a level, either a new one or from an old session.

      • LevelWindow

        public LevelWindow(java.util.List<Profile> profiles)
        Constructs a LevelWindow instance. Needs the profiles because the Level constructor needs them.
        Parameters:
        profiles - The profiles to construct new levels with.

    • Method Detail

      • level

        public Level level()
        May be null if no level was selected yet or the user cancelled.
        Returns:
        The retrieve level, if any.

      • _createActionButtons

        private void _createActionButtons()

      • _getNewLevel

        private void _getNewLevel()
        Sets up a new Level (as opposed to a session) by opening a file dialog. Then goes on to open the theme-selection window and difficulty widget.

      • _getTheme

        private Theme _getTheme()
        Opens a ThemeWindow for selecting a theme.
        Returns:
        The selected theme, if any. Null if cancelled.

      • _getDifficulty

        private Level.Difficulty _getDifficulty()
        Opens a DifficultyWidget for selecting a difficulty.
        Returns:
        The selected difficulty, if any. Null if cancelled.

      • _getSession

        private void _getSession()
        Opens the a file dialog for the sessions and tries to select one.
